description.p: Nysos is the god of semen, blood, wine, and all potent liquids.

p.strong: Goddess of War, Vengeance, Crows, Prophecy, and Death

description.p: Morrigan is one of the triple Goddesses in Celtic mythology called the three Morrígna. She is known to cause fear and confusion among soldiers to move the tide of battle to her favoured side. Morrigan may also appear prior to a battle to foreshadow the extent of the carnage to come, or to predict the death of a notable person.

Appearance. Morrigan is represented similarly in almost every artistic representation of her. She is young, with long, flowing dark hair. Her clothing is black and sometimes very revealing. Other times, she is cloaked so as not to show her face. Because she was a shape-shifter, she is often shown with one of the more common forms she would take on-the crow or raven. She is strikingly beautiful yet intimidating.

p.strong: Goddess of Frenzied War and Havoc

description.p: Neamhain is one of the triple Goddesses in Celtic mythology called the three Morrígna. Neamhain is the personification of the frenzied havoc of war, capable of producing a fear aura that has been known to drive enemies to impale themselves on their own weapons. Occasionally she appears as an ill-omen near rivers and creeks, washing the clothes or entrails of a doomed warrior.
Appearance. She is young woman, with long, flowing dark hair. Goes into battle wearing only war paint.

Macha is one of the triple Goddesses in Celtic mythology called the three Morrígna. The fiery haired goddess is both a fearsome warrior and a decider of sovereign rulers, choosing who is worthy to lead her people and who is not. Her preferred method of combat is on horseback, and as such she shows favoritism toward those fighters that also ride into battles.
Appearance. She is young woman, with long, fiery red hair.

p.strong: Fey King of the Seelie Court

description.p: Oberon is the King of the Seelie Court and consort to Titania. He is known to be impulsive and a prankster.

Appearance. Oberon has a mostly humanoid form with the exception of his deer horns and deer hooves, which make him resemble a satyr. He has fair skin, yellow eyes and long, bushy, dark green hair that reaches beyond his back.
